RelatedSentence: Ahead of the commencement of the Common External Tariff ( CET ) regime across  West Africa in 2015 , Nigerian manufacturers are strategising on how to consolidate on their penetration of the regional market .
The private BusinessDay newspaper reported Monday that the manufacturers are taking steps to check the increasing infiltration of the regional market by Asian and European exporters .
